feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r MobileGames(MobileGames) :m Input(Input) :g [1,*] : TouchScreen(TouchScreen) : Keypad(Keypad) : Speech(Speech) : Movementdetection(Movementdetection) :o Output(Output) :o ForceFeedback(ForceFeedback) :o NetworkSupport(NetworkSupport) :o OnlineMultiplayer(OnlineMultiplayer) :o Internationalization(Internationalization) :o Internationallanguangessupport(Internationallanguangessupport) :o PlatformIndependence(PlatformIndependence) :o Platformindependencesupport(Platformindependencesupport) :o Payandbillsupport(Payandbillsupport) :o Payandbillsystem(Payandbillsystem)
feature_model.constraints: C1:TouchScreen or Keypad or Speech or Movementdetection or Input or ForceFeedback or Output or OnlineMultiplayer or NetworkSupport or Internationallanguangessupport or Internationalization or Platformindependencesupport or PlatformIndependence or Payandbillsystem or Payandbillsupport or MobileGames
